Input Variables: Accretion of discount,Adjusted purchase price,Face value,Purchase price
Calculation Rule:
1. purchase price of a debt security = no: of securities * unit price

2. adjusted purchase price of a debt security =  

discounts = 10% of purchase price of a debt security (rate variable by Fed)

purchase price of a debt security - discounts

3. If "purchase price of a debt security" > = "face value"

  accretion of discount

else
 
  adjusted purchase price of a debt security
